main_definition: A small, flat case that is used to carry paper money, credit cards, and other personal items.

meanings_and_examples.example: He pulled out his wallet to show me his ID.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A physical object for holding money and cards
meanings_and_examples.example: She found a $20 bill in her wallet after looking through it.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Symbol of one's financial status or lifestyle
meanings_and_examples.example: His designer wallet was the talk of the party, showcasing his wealth and style.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A source of income or earnings
meanings_and_examples.example: The government collected taxes from citizens' pockets, their wallets becoming a source of revenue.
